column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant | Participants # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=Last year I visited my friend across the country .
#id=2
#text=I live in California and he lives in North Carolina .
#id=3
#text=I knew that I was n't going to drive all that way ; I needed a more efficient option .
#id=4
#text=I decided to start looking up how much a flight would cost .
#id=5
#text=I researched what airlines provided flights from the airport nearest to where I live .
#id=6
#text=I then had to decide when exactly I wanted to fly there and back , as some days can be cheaper than others .
#id=7
#text=We settled on the dates that worked best for both of us , and I booked the cheapest flight I could find for a round-trip ticket .
#id=8
#text=When it was time for my trip , I packed my bags and coordinated with a friend to give me a ride to the airport .
#id=9
#text=My friend picked me up early enough so that by the time we got to the airport , I would be about an hour and a half early for my flight .
#text=I then had to check in and go through security .
#text=Because I only had one small suitcase , I did not have to check my bags .
#text=I waited in the terminal for my flight to arrive , reading a book to pass the time .
#text=When the plane landed from the previous flight , I also had to wait for those passengers to unload .
#text=They began calling different sections to board , and mine was one of the last ones .
#text=I easily found my seat and stowed my suitcase in the compartment above .
#text=I was sitting in the middle row , and the other two passengers next to me were already in their seats .
#text=When I got seated , I went ahead and buckled my seat belt and awaited take off .
#text=The flight attendants had to make all their checks and when it was time to go , we also had an overview of the emergency procedures .
#text=I did n't have too much room between myself and the seat in front of me , but there was a little tray on the back of that seat which I put down to use to hold the drink I ordered later .
#text=I made small talk with the passengers next to me and we shared our travel plans .
#text=It was overall a decent flight , and we made good time and arrived with no issues .
